   21: 
   22: -module(ssl_sni_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   30: 
   31: %% Callback functions
   32: -export([all/0,
   33:          groups/0,
   34:          init_per_suite/1,
   35:          end_per_suite/1,
   36:          init_per_group/2,
   37:          end_per_group/2,
   38:          init_per_testcase/2,
   39:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   40: 
   41: %% Testcases
   42: -export([no_sni_header/1,
   43:          sni_match/1,
   44:          sni_no_match/1,
   45:          no_sni_header_fun/1,
   46:          sni_match_fun/1,
   47:          sni_no_match_fun/1,
   48:          dns_name/1,
   49:          ip_fallback/1,
   50:          no_ip_fallback/1,
   51:          dns_name_reuse/1,
   52:          customize_hostname_check/0,
   53:          customize_hostname_check/1,
   54:          sni_no_trailing_dot/0,
   55:          sni_no_trailing_dot/1,
   56:          hostname_trailing_dot/0,
   57:          hostname_trailing_dot/1
   58:         ]).
   59: 
   60: %% Apply export
   61: -export([send_and_hostname/1,
   62:          recv_and_certificate/1
   63:         ]).
   64: 
   65: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 6}).
   66: 
   67: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   69: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: 
   71: all() ->
   72:     [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   73:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   74:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   75:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   76:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   77:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   78:     ].
   79: 
   80: groups() ->
   81:     [
   82:      {'tlsv1.3', [], sni_tests()},
   83:      {'tlsv1.2', [], sni_tests()},
   84:      {'tlsv1.1', [], sni_tests()},
   85:      {'tlsv1', [], sni_tests()},
   86:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], sni_tests()},
   87:      {'dtlsv1', [], sni_tests()}
   88:     ].
   89: 
   90: sni_tests() ->
   91:     [no_sni_header, 
   92:      sni_match, 
   93:      sni_no_match,
   94:      no_sni_header_fun, 
   95:      sni_match_fun, 
   96:      sni_no_match_fun,
   97:      dns_name,
   98:      ip_fallback,
   99:      no_ip_fallback,
  100:      dns_name_reuse,
  101:      customize_hostname_check,
  102:      sni_no_trailing_dot,
  103:      hostname_trailing_dot].
  104: 
  105: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  106:     catch crypto:stop(),
  107:     try crypto:start() of
  108:         ok ->
  109:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  110:             Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  111:             {#{server_config := ServerConf,
  112:                client_config := ClientConf},
  113:              #{server_config := LServerConf,
  114:                client_config := LClientConf}} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_sni_configs(),
  115:             %% RSA certs files needed by *dot cases
  116:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert([{client_opts, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf]},
  117:                                         {client_local_opts, [{verify, verify_peer} | LClientConf]},
  118:                                         {sni_server_opts, [{sni_hosts, [{Hostname, ServerConf}]} | LServerConf]}
  119:                                        | Config0])
  120:     catch _:_  ->
  121:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  122:     end.
  123: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  124:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  125: 
  126: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  127:    ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  128: 
  129: end_per_suite(_) ->
  130:     ssl:stop(),
  131:     application:stop(crypto).
  132: 
  133: init_per_testcase(customize_hostname_check, Config) ->
  134:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  135:     ssl_test_lib:clean_start(keep_version),
  136:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  137:     Config;
  138: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  139:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  140:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  141:     ?CT_LOG("Ciphers: ~p~n ", [ ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version)]),
  142:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  143:     Config.
  144: 
  145: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  146:     Config.
  147: 
  148: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  149: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  150: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  151: no_sni_header(Config) ->
  152:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  153:     ServerOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config), Config),
  154:     ClientOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, disable} |
  155:                                               proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  156:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, undefined).
  157: 
  158: no_sni_header_fun(Config) ->
  159:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  160:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  161:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, []) end,
  162:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  163:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, disable} |
  164:                                                proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  165:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, undefined).
  166: 
  167: sni_match(Config) ->
  168:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  169:     ServerOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config), Config),
  170:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  171:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  172:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, HostName).
  173: 
  174: sni_match_fun(Config) ->
  175:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  176:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  177:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, undefined) end,
  178:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  179:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  180:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  181:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, HostName).
  182: 
  183: sni_no_match(Config) ->
  184:    {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  185:     [_ | DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  186:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  187:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  188:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config),
  189:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName).
  190: 
  191: sni_no_match_fun(Config) ->
  192:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  193:     [{sni_hosts, _}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  194:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config),
  195:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  196:                                                proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  197:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName).
  198: 
  199: dns_name(Config) ->
  200:     Hostname = "OTP.test.server",
  201:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  202:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  203:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  204:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  205:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  206:                                           peer => [{extensions,  [#'Extension'{extnID =
  207:                                                                                    ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  208:                                                                                extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname}],
  209:                                                                                critical = false}]},
  210:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]},
  211:                                     client_chain =>
  212:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  213:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  214:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  215:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  216:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++  ServerOpts0,
  217:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
  218:     unsuccessfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], undefined, Config),
  219:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer},
  220:                                      {server_name_indication, Hostname} | ClientConf], undefined, Config),
  221:     unsuccessfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer}, {server_name_indication, "foo"} | ClientConf],
  222:                           undefined, Config),
  223:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer}, {server_name_indication, disable} | ClientConf],
  224:                         undefined, Config).
  225: 
  226: ip_fallback(Config) ->
  227:     Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  228:     {ok, #hostent{h_addr_list = [IP |_]}} = inet:gethostbyname(net_adm:localhost()),
  229:     IPList = tuple_to_list(IP),
  230:     IPStr  = lists:flatten(integer_to_list(hd(IPList)) ++ [io_lib:format(".~w", [I]) || I <- tl(IPList)]),
  231:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  232:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  233:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  234:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  235:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  236:                                           peer => [{extensions, [#'Extension'{extnID =
  237:                                                                                   ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  238:                                                                               extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname},
  239:                                                                                            {iPAddress, IPList}],
  240:                                                                               critical = false}]},
  241:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]},
  242:                                     client_chain =>
  243:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  244:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  245:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  246:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  247:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++  ServerOpts0,
  248:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
  249:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], Hostname, Config),
  250:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IP, Config),
  251:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IPStr, Config),
  252:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], list_to_atom(Hostname), Config).
  253: 
  254: no_ip_fallback(Config) ->
  255:     Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  256:     {ok, #hostent{h_addr_list = [IP |_]}} = inet:gethostbyname(net_adm:localhost()),
  257:     IPList = tuple_to_list(IP),
  258:     IPStr  = lists:flatten(integer_to_list(hd(IPList)) ++ [io_lib:format(".~w", [I]) || I <- tl(IPList)]),
  259:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  260:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  261:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  262:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  263:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  264:                                           peer => [{extensions, [#'Extension'{extnID =
  265:                                                                                   ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  266:                                                                               extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname}],
  267:                                                                               critical = false}]},
  268:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}
  269:                                                   ]},
  270:                                     client_chain =>
  271:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  272:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  273:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  274:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  275:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++  ServerOpts0,
  276:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
  277:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], Hostname, Config),
  278:     unsuccessfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IP, Config),
  279:     unsuccessfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IPStr, Config).
  280: 
  281: dns_name_reuse(Config) ->
  282:     SNIHostname = "OTP.test.server",
  283:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  284:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  285:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  286:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  287:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  288:                                           peer => [{extensions,  [#'Extension'{extnID =
  289:                                                                                    ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  290:                                                                                extnValue = [{dNSName, SNIHostname}],
  291:                                                                                critical = false}
  292:                                                                  ]},
  293:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}
  294:                                                   ]},
  295:                                     client_chain =>
  296:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  297:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  298:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  299:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  300:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++  ServerOpts0,
  301:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
  302: 
  303:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  304: 
  305:     unsuccessfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], undefined, Config),
  306: 
  307:     Server =
  308: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  309: 				   {from, self()},
  310: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  311: 				   {options, ServerConf}]),
  312:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  313:     Client0 =
  314: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  315:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  316: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  317:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{verify, verify_peer},
  318:                                                               {server_name_indication, SNIHostname} | ClientConf]}]),
  319:     receive
  320:         {Server, _} ->
  321:             ok
  322:     end,
  323: 
  324:     Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}}},
  325: 
  326:     %% Make sure session is registered
  327:     ct:sleep(1000),
  328: 
  329:     Client1 =
  330: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode},
  331:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  332:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  333:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf]}]),
  334: 
  335:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client1, handshake_failure),
  336:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0).
  337: 
  338: 
  339: customize_hostname_check() ->
  340:     [{doc,"Test option customize_hostname_check."}].
  341: customize_hostname_check(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  342:     Ext = [#'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  343:                         extnValue = [{dNSName, "*.example.org"}],
  344:                         critical = false}
  345:           ],
  346:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  347:       client_config := ClientOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(rsa, [{server_chain,
  348:                                                                                [[], 
  349:                                                                                 [],
  350:                                                                                 [{extensions, Ext}]
  351:                                                                                ]}], 
  352:                                                                         Config, "https_hostname_convention"),
  353:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ClientOpts0, Config),
  354:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ServerOpts0, Config),  
  355:                                         
  356:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  357:   
  358:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  359:                                         {host, Hostname},
  360: 					{from, self()}, 
  361: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  362: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  363:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  364:     
  365:     CustomFun = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname_match_fun(https),
  366:     
  367:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  368:                                         {host, Hostname},
  369: 					 {from, self()}, 
  370:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  371:                                         {options,
  372:                                          [{verify, verify_peer},
  373:                                           {server_name_indication, "other.example.org"},
  374:                                           {customize_hostname_check, 
  375:                                            [{match_fun, CustomFun}]} | ClientOpts]
  376: 					 }]),    
  377:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  378:     
  379:     Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}}},
  380:                                         
  381:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  382:                                                {host, Hostname},
  383:                                                {from, self()}, 
  384:                                                {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  385:                                                {options, [{verify, verify_peer},
  386:                                                           {server_name_indication, "other.example.org"} | ClientOpts]}
  387:                                               ]),    
  388:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client1, handshake_failure).
  389: 
  390: sni_no_trailing_dot() ->
  391:       [{doc,"Test that sni may not include a triling dot"}].
  392: sni_no_trailing_dot(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  393:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
  394:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(sni_server_opts, Config),
  395: 
  396:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  397: 
  398:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  399:                                  {from, self()},
  400:                                  {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  401:                                  {options, [ServerOpts]}]),
  402: 
  403:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  404: 
  405:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  406: 					      {host, Hostname},
  407: 					      {from, self()},
  408:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  409: 					      {options,
  410:                                                [{server_name_indication, Hostname ++ "."} | ClientOpts]}]),
  411:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, unrecognized_name).
  412: 
  413: hostname_trailing_dot() ->
  414:     [{doc,"Test that fallback sni removes trailing dot of hostname"}].
  415: 
  416: hostname_trailing_dot(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  417:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
  418:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(sni_server_opts, Config),
  419:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname0} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  420: 
  421:     case trailing_dot_hostname(Hostname0) of
  422:         {ok, Hostname} ->
  423:             Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  424:                                                 {from, self()},
  425:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  426:                                                 {options, ServerOpts}]),
  427:             Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  428:             Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  429:                                                 {host, Hostname},
  430:                                                 {from, self()},
  431:                                                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  432:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
  433: 
  434:             ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  435: 
  436:             ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  437:             ssl_test_lib:close(Client);
  438:         {skip, _ } = Skip ->
  439:             Skip
  440:     end.
  441: 
  442: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  443: %% Callback Functions ------------------------------------------------
  444: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  445: send_and_hostname(SSLSocket) ->
  446:     ssl:send(SSLSocket, "OK"),
  447:     case  ssl:connection_information(SSLSocket, [sni_hostname]) of
  448: 	{ok, [{sni_hostname, Hostname}]} ->
  449: 	    Hostname;
  450: 	{ok, []} ->
  451: 	    undefined
  452:     end.
  453: 
  454: recv_and_certificate(SSLSocket) ->
  455:     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, "OK"),
  456:     {ok, PeerCert} = ssl:peercert(SSLSocket),
  457:     #'OTPCertificate'{tbsCertificate = #'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = {rdnSequence, Subject}}} 
  458: 	= public_key:pkix_decode_cert(PeerCert, otp),
  459:     ?CT_LOG("Subject of certificate received from server: ~p", [Subject]),
  460:     rdn_to_string(rdnPart(Subject, ?'id-at-commonName')).
  461: 
  462: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  463: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
  464: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  465: basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, Expected) ->
  466:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  467:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {?MODULE, send_and_hostname, []}},
  468:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  469:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  470:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  471:                                         {host, HostName}, {from, self()},
  472:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, recv_and_certificate, []}},
  473:                                         {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOptions]}]),
  474:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Expected, Client,  "server Peer cert"),
  475:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  476:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  477: 
  478: basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName) ->
  479:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  480:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  481:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  482:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  483:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  484:                                               {host, HostName}, {from, self()},
  485:                                               {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOptions]}]),
  486:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client, handshake_failure),
  487:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  488:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  489: 
  490: successfull_connect(ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Hostname0, Config) ->  
  491:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname1} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  492:     Hostname = host_name(Hostname0, Hostname1),
  493:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  494:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  495:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  496:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  497:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  498:                                         {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
  499:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  500:                                         {options, ClientOptions}]),
  501:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  502:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  503:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  504: 
  505: unsuccessfull_connect(ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Hostname0, Config) ->
  506:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname1} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  507:     Hostname = host_name(Hostname0, Hostname1),
  508:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  509: 					      {from, self()},
  510: 					      {options, ServerOptions}]),
  511:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  512:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  513: 					      {host, Hostname},
  514: 					      {from, self()}, 
  515: 					      {options, ClientOptions}]),
  516:     
  517:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  518: 
  519: host_name(undefined, Hostname) ->
  520:     Hostname;
  521: host_name(Hostname, _) ->
  522:     Hostname.
  523: 
  524: trailing_dot_hostname(HostName) ->
  525:     case lists:member($., HostName) of
  526:         true ->
  527:             case lists:last(HostName) =/= $. of
  528:                 true ->
  529:                     {ok, HostName ++ "."};
  530:                 false ->
  531:                     {ok, HostName}
  532:             end;
  533:         _ ->
  534:             {skip, "Trailing dot conf not possible"}
  535:      end.
  536: 
  537: ssl_recv(SSLSocket, Expect) ->
  538:     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, "", Expect).
  539: 
  540: ssl_recv(SSLSocket, CurrentData, ExpectedData) ->
  541:     receive
  542:         {ssl, SSLSocket, Data} ->
  543:             NeweData = CurrentData ++ Data,
  544:             case NeweData of
  545:                 ExpectedData ->
  546:                     ok;
  547:                 _  ->
  548:                     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, NeweData, ExpectedData)
  549:             end;
  550:         Other ->
  551:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other})
  552:     after 4000 ->
  553:             ct:fail({timeout, CurrentData, ExpectedData})
  554:     end.
  555: 
  556: rdnPart([[#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type=Type, value=Value} | _] | _], Type) ->
  557:     Value;
  558: rdnPart([_ | Tail], Type) ->
  559:     rdnPart(Tail, Type);
  560: rdnPart([], _) ->
  561:     unknown.
  562: 
  563: rdn_to_string({utf8String, Binary}) ->
  564:     erlang:binary_to_list(Binary);
  565: rdn_to_string({printableString, String}) ->
  566:     String.
